channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 台湾当选总统表示希望加入美国主导的贸易框架
item.description: Taiwan's president-elect, Lai Ching-te, signalled on Wednesday his desire for Taipei to join the U.S.-led Indo-Pacific Economic Framework, considering the island's key role in the global economy.翻译:台湾当选总统赖清德周三表示，考虑到台湾在全球经济中的关键作用，他希望台北加入美国主导的印太经济框架。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 逆向投资者察觉机遇，中国卖空者撤退
item.description: Global investors aren't expecting much from China's economy this year, but some say the collapse in its already cheap stocks merits a wager on an eventual rebound and perhaps a new approach to investing in the market.翻译:全球投资者对今年中国经济的预期并不高，但一些人表示，本已便宜的股市暴跌值得押注于最终反弹，或许还需要采取新的市场投资方式。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国股市或芭比娃娃运气不佳
item.description: A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee翻译:Ankur Banerjee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 蒙古官员称天然气卡车爆炸造成六名消防员死亡
item.description: At least six people were killed including three firefighters after a truck carrying 60 tons of liquefied natural gas exploded in the Mongolian capital of Ulaanbaatar on Wednesday, according to Mongolia's emergency officials.翻译:据蒙古紧急情况官员称，周三，一辆载有60吨液化天然气的卡车在蒙古首都乌兰巴托发生爆炸，造成至少六人死亡，其中包括三名消防员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国要求中国敦促伊朗遏制胡塞武装袭击红海 - FT
item.description: The United States has asked China to urge Tehran to rein in the Iranian-aligned Houthi rebels attacking commercial ships in the Red Sea but has seen little sign of help from Beijing, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing U.S. officials.翻译:英国《金融时报》周三援引美国官员的话报道称，美国已要求中国敦促德黑兰遏制与伊朗结盟的胡塞武装在红海袭击商船，但北京几乎没有提供帮助的迹象。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟制定经济安全计划 关注中国
item.description: The European Commission will set out plans on Wednesday to bolster the European Union's economic security through closer scrutiny of foreign investment and tighter controls on exports and outflows of technologies to rivals such as China.翻译:欧盟委员会将于周三制定计划，通过对外国投资进行更严格的审查以及对向中国等竞争对手的出口和技术外流进行更严格的控制来加强欧盟的经济安全。
item.author: Philip Blenkinsop

item.title: 独家：特斯拉计划于 2025 年中期生产新款电动汽车
item.description: Tesla has told suppliers it wants to start production of a new mass market electric vehicle codenamed "Redwood" in mid-2025, according to four people familiar with the matter, with two of them describing the model as a compact crossover.翻译:据四位知情人士透露，特斯拉已告知供应商，希望在 2025 年中期开始生产一款代号为“Redwood”的新型大众市场电动汽车，其中两人将该车型描述为紧凑型跨界车。
item.author: Hyunjoo Jin, Joseph White

item.title: 前台湾盟友瑙鲁与中国恢复外交关系
item.description: China and Nauru re-established diplomatic ties on Wednesday, after the tiny Pacific island nation unexpectedly severed relations with its now former ally Taiwan in a move the United States described as "unfortunate".翻译:中国和瑙鲁周三重新建立了外交关系，此前这个太平洋小岛国出人意料地断绝了与其前盟友台湾的关系，美国称此举“不幸”。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 碧桂园寻求出售广州价值5.3亿美元的资产
item.description: Embattled Chinese property developer Country Garden is selling properties in Guangzhou, aiming to raise 3.8 billion yuan ($530 million), according to an asset transaction platform.翻译:据资产交易平台称，陷入困境的中国房地产开发商碧桂园正在广州出售房产，旨在筹集 38 亿元人民币（5.3 亿美元）的资金。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国监管部门要求基金遏制股指期货卖空行为
item.description: China's securities regulators have asked some hedge fund managers to restrict short selling in its stock index futures market, two sources said, as authorities seek to stabilise sinking stocks.翻译:两名消息人士称，中国证券监管机构已要求一些对冲基金经理限制股指期货市场的卖空行为，以稳定正在下跌的股票。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2023年中国城镇新增就业1244万人，称今年需加大力度
item.description: China created 12.44 million new urban jobs last year, meeting its target, but more efforts are needed to prop up employment amid uncertain economic conditions in 2024, the country's human resources ministry told a press conference on Wednesday.翻译:中国人力资源部周三在新闻发布会上表示，去年中国城镇新增就业1244万人，实现了目标，但在2024年经济形势不确定的情况下，需要加大力度支撑就业。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本12月出口飙升至创纪录水平；中国出货量出现期待已久的反弹
item.description: Japan's exports surged to record highs in December, with shipments to the U.S. soaring to their strongest-ever level while those to China were also robust, logging their first rise in more than a year.翻译:日本12月出口飙升至历史新高，其中对美国的出口飙升至历史最高水平，对中国的出口也强劲，创下一年多以来的首次增长。
item.author: Satoshi Sugiyama

item.title: 潜在的中国救助方案提振情绪，亚洲股市上涨
item.description: Asian shares rose on Wednesday on optimism that Chinese authorities will offer support for its stock markets, which have plummeted to multi-year lows, while a hawkish tilt from the Bank of Japan lifted the yen.翻译:亚洲股市周三上涨，因市场乐观地认为中国当局将为已跌至多年低点的股市提供支持，而日本央行的鹰派倾向提振了日元。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 美联储观点推动美元徘徊在六周高位附近；日本央行推动日元小幅上涨
item.description: The dollar hovered near a six-week high against major peers on Wednesday as investors cemented expectations that the Federal Reserve would be in no rush to cut interest rates in the face of a resilient U.S. economy.翻译:周三，美元兑主要货币徘徊在六周高点附近，因投资者强化了美联储在美国经济强劲的情况下不会急于降息的预期。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 菲律宾称武装部队将确保南海“畅通无阻、和平”的勘探
item.description: The Philippines armed forces will guarantee the "unimpeded and peaceful" exploration and exploitation of natural resources within the country's exclusive economic zone (EEZ) as it shifts its focus to external defence, Manila's defense secretary said.翻译:马尼拉国防部长表示，随着菲律宾将重点转向对外防御，菲律宾武装部队将保证在该国专属经济区（EEZ）内“不受阻碍、和平”地勘探和开采自然资源。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国表示欧盟“不公平”的电动汽车补贴调查可能会损害两国关系 - 彭博社
item.description: China's ambassador to the European Union called the EU's probe into Chinese electric vehicle manufacturers over state subsidies "unfair", Fu Cong told Bloomberg News in an interview.翻译:傅聪在接受彭博社采访时表示，中国驻欧盟大使称欧盟对中国电动汽车制造商国家补贴的调查“不公平”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 图瓦卢部长预计将在大选后重新审视与台湾的关系
item.description: Tuvalu expects to review its diplomatic ties with Taiwan after Friday's election, Finance Minister Seve Paeniu told Reuters, adding voters in the tiny Pacific Island nation wanted more financial support from the international community for climate change and development.翻译:图瓦卢财政部长Seve Paeniu告诉路透社，图瓦卢预计在周五选举后重新审视与台湾的外交关系，并补充说这个太平洋小岛国的选民希望国际社会为气候变化和发展提供更多财政支持。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 投资者团体对尾矿坝落后者加大力度
item.description: A group of investors managing more than $25 trillion said they plan to challenge mining companies that have not yet committed to a tailings dam best-practice standard and may vote against management at upcoming annual meetings.翻译:一群管理着超过 25 万亿美元的投资者表示，他们计划挑战尚未承诺尾矿坝最佳实践标准的矿业公司，并可能在即将举行的年度会议上投票反对管理层。
item.author: Clara Denina, Simon Jessop

item.title: 美国议员抵达台湾表达大选后支持
item.description: The leaders of the U.S. House of Representatives Taiwan Caucus, Republican Representative Mario Diaz Balart and Democratic Representative Ami Bera, have arrived in Taipei, their offices said on Tuesday, in a show of support after the island's election.翻译:美国众议院台湾核心小组领导人、共和党众议员马里奥·迪亚斯·巴拉特和民主党众议员阿米·贝拉办公室周二表示，他们已抵达台北，以在台湾大选后表示支持。
item.author: Patricia Zengerle

item.title: 早盘：考验中港股反弹能力
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever
